title: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Build 200201151. When searching for references to a field, the search results are not selected.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not selected.
EB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match should be selected.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the search functionality.
3. Search for references to a specific field.
4. Double-click on a search result.
5. Observe that the first match is not selected.
